subject: Re: Massage Therapist

full_threads.body:

Chris will reply to client on the other support ticket

Hi @ricaV2 done creating Izaak as team member

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rika,

Please see the below request from Brendan, if possible, can we please complete this task today?

Task: Add a new team member page then send draft for Brendan’s review.
Copy: Below
Images: Main profile (grey background to match others) https://www.dropbox.com/s/f6zremz5rzfogvp/IMG_0265%202%20Brendan%20McGovern.HEIC?dl=0
Circle image for the team scroll: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qljaledkxgseoeq/IMG_0256%202%20Brendan%20McGovern.heic?dl=0

Please ensure the cropping and proportions match the existing images as closely as possible.

Thank you!

Hi Chris,

Could we get the structure up and ready to go.

He says he's going to get the bio ready for me tomorrow, but I would like to send something out tomorrow ready to go.

I have written something - we can add his bits in later - if ok?

Here is what I wrote:


Izaak Deklerk
Remedial Massage Therapist
Diploma in Remedial Massage Therapy

Izaak loves all things health and fitness. He is a keen fitness enthusiast who enjoys a variety of sports and gym training.

Izaak works as a Personal Trainer in the Inner West and as an individual passionate about helping his clients achieve their goals, he was drawn to massage therapy to help support his clients in their fitness journey.

Izaak completed his Diploma in Remedial Massage Therapy in Sydney at TAFE and has also completed his Cert 3 & 4 in Personal Training.

Izaak is a firm believer that you need to move well to train well. As such, he is excited to be working alongside the Physiotherapists at RedoHealth.

Izaak’s Clinic Days: Tuesday & Saturday.



Qualifications:


Remedial Massage Diploma (Meadowbank TAFE)
Massage Certificate IV (Meadowbank Tafe)
King Sport International Injury Prevention Level 1
Certificate IV in Fitness
Certificate III in Fitness
Australian Institute of Personal Training
CPR Certificate
First Aid Certificate


Brendan McGovern
Clinic Director, Principal Physiotherapist
BSc Human Kinetics / MSc Physiotherapy

P | 02 8021 2180 F | 02 4044 0265
A | 73 Mullens Street, Balmain NSW 2041
Book Appointment Online <https://redohealth.au1.cliniko.com/bookings?business_id=40344&practitioner_id=59732>

>> Hi Brendan,
>>
>> Congratulations on Izaak’s appointment.
>>
>> Confirming the massage page is live.
>>
>> Once Izaak’s BIO is ready, please send it over and we’ll prepare a draft page for your review.
>>
>> As for the photos, great question! From my experience, graininess is usually caused by a combination of low light and too much zoom. I would make sure:
>>
>> There is adequate light wherever you are shooting
>> Shoot in landscape
>> Don’t rely on zoom (e.g. position yourself to shoot without it)
>>
>> If in doubt, you are most welcome to send a couple through to get another perspective.
>>
>> Regards,
>>
>>
